author: goblirsc
body:
#### PR description:
This MR adds a check of the `Pede` exit code when running an alignment fit using the `MillePedeAlignmentAlgorithm`. This code is not returned when exiting like in other programs, but instead written to a one-character text file. We pick up this file and read back the code. 
Warning or error messages are emitted if anomalous codes are encountered, depending on the severity.

#### PR validation:

- unit tests of `MillePedeAlignmentAlgorithm` and `CommonAlignmentAlgorithm`: :heavy_check_mark: 
- limited `runTheMatrix` payload: :heavy_check_mark: (exception: The usual missing inputs)
- runTheMatrix with alignment-related payloads `1000,1001,1001.2,1001.3,1001.4,1002.3,1002.4,1002.5` - four step-2 failures due to missing input, otherwise :heavy_check_mark: 
- test using modified code to re-run `mp4141` alignment campaign's `pede` job - successful execution

#### If this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR. If this PR will be backported please specify to which release cycle the backport is meant for:

No backport.
title: Millepede: check the pede exit code
